channel.title: Development on 姜小豆的日常
channel.description: Recent content in Development on 姜小豆的日常

item.title: github pages 搭建博客
item.description: 选了一个博客主题，是基于hugo的。 步骤 安装 Go 安装hugo go install -tags extended github.com/gohugoio/hugo@latest 报错：go: github.com/gohugoio/hugo@latest: module github.com/gohugoio/hugo: Get “https://proxy.golang.org/github.com/gohugoio/hugo/@v/list": dial tcp 142.251.42.241:443: connectex: A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond. 需要设置模块代理 go env -w GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn。 再次安装hugo，报错cgo: C compiler "gcc" not found: exec: "gcc": executable file not found in %PATH%。需要GCC，在go huge源码安装页面也有说明。 可以安装mingw，把bin放到环境变量Path中。 输入 hugo version 报错。放弃这个方法。直接下载安装包（intel下载amd即可）。
